## Maps

27-07-2018

```{r map, echo = FALSE}
df <- data.frame(lat = runif(500, min = -23, max = -22),
                 lng = runif(500, min = -47, max = -46))

df %>% 
  leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%
  addMarkers(clusterOptions = markerClusterOptions())
```
